results.title: Taylor Swift Endorses Kamala Harris
results.abstract: In a post on Instagram, the pop superstar said the evening’s debate convinced her to weigh in publicly.
results.byline: By Nicholas Nehamas and Theodore Schleifer

multimedia.caption: In her Instagram post with her pet cat, Taylor Swift said she would vote for Kamala Harris “because she fights for the rights and causes I believe need a warrior to champion them.”

results.title: Transgender Lawmaker Wins Democratic Primary for Delaware’s Only House Seat
results.abstract: Sarah McBride, a Delaware state senator, is favored to win in November. She would become the first openly transgender member of Congress.

results.title: Melania Trump, Silent for Months, Re-emerges in a Series of Cryptic Videos
results.abstract: In one, released online on Tuesday, she muses conspiratorially about the attempt on her husband’s life. The videos are intended to promote a new memoir.

results.abstract: Maggie Goodlander, who has deep Washington ties, edged out Colin Van Ostern, who unsuccessfully ran for New Hampshire governor in 2016.

results.title: Israeli Bombing in Gaza Humanitarian Zone Kills at Least 19, Officials Say
results.abstract: The Israeli airstrike, which the military said targeted Hamas militants, appeared to use 2,000-pound bombs, which Israel has been criticized for using in heavily populated areas.
results.byline: By Rawan Sheikh Ahmad, Ephrat Livni, Sanjana Varghese and Thomas Fuller

multimedia.caption: The site of Israeli strikes on a makeshift camp for internally displaced Palestinians in Al-Mawasi, Gaza, on Tuesday.

results.title: Israeli Military Reveals Brutal Conditions 6 Hostages Endured in a Gaza Tunnel
results.abstract: The hostages, whose bodies were recently recovered, appear to have spent the last weeks of their lives in a tight and humid tunnel about 20 meters underground.

results.title: Polaris Dawn Astronauts Reach Record High Orbit Above Earth
results.abstract: After launching early on Tuesday, the billionaire Jared Isaacman and his crew traveled to altitudes not visited by any astronaut since the Apollo moon missions of the 1960s and ’70s.

results.title: Francine Becomes a Hurricane as it Approaches the Gulf Coast
results.abstract: The storm reached Category 1 strength on Tuesday evening and is expected to bring dangerous conditions to the Louisiana coast on Wednesday.

results.title: Louisiana Prepares for Hurricane Francine to Make Landfall
results.abstract: Forecasters warned that cities along the Louisiana coast could see heavy rainfall and a “dangerous” storm surge. Many residents were rushing to get supplies as the storm neared.

results.title: ‘Imminent Threat’ Found at Boar’s Head Plant 2 Years Before Fatal Listeria Outbreak
results.abstract: U.S. inspectors listed serious problems in 2022 that could have resulted in strict measures like a pause in production. But the plant continued operating, and some conditions persisted.
results.byline: By Christina Jewett and Teddy Rosenbluth
org_facet: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

multimedia.caption: The Boar’s Head plant in Jarratt, Va. has been closed indefinitely while the company and federal authorities investigate the cause of the listeria outbreak.
The Boar’s Head plant in Jarratt, Va. has been closed indefinitely while the company and federal authorities investigate the cause of the listeria outbreak.

results.title: Missouri High Court Restores Abortion Measure to Ballot
results.abstract: The court ruled hours before the state’s deadline for printing ballots for absentee voters, reversing the secretary of state who had invalidated the measure weeks after certifying it.

results.title: Orange County Leader Faces Scrutiny Over Charity’s Pandemic Spending
results.abstract: Andrew Do, an Orange County supervisor, has been asked to resign after directing more than $13 million to a nonprofit run by his daughter and allies. The group was supposed to spend the money on meals for vulnerable residents.

results.title: Was James Earl Jones an EGOT Winner? It’s Complicated.
results.abstract: The actor won just about every award he could — but his Oscar was an honorary one. Is that enough for an EGOT?

results.title: ‘Emily in Paris’ Goes on a Roman Holiday
results.abstract: The frothy Netflix show frustrated Parisians with its portrait of their city. Now its heroine is heading to Rome — and the showrunner doesn’t care if residents there feel the same way.

multimedia.caption: New episodes offer a picture-postcard view of the Eternal City, with stops at touristic hallmarks like the Trevi Fountain, the Colosseum and the Spanish Steps.
New episodes offer a picture-postcard view of the Eternal City, with stops at touristic hallmarks like the Trevi Fountain, the Colosseum and the Spanish Steps.
